snippet: A monk in a Tibetan region of western China killed himself by setting himself on fire Monday evening to protest Chinese rule, an advocacy group said.
abstract: Monk Lobsang Gedun kills himself by setting himself on fire in in Qinghai Province, China, to protest Chinese rule.
lead_paragraph: A monk in a Tibetan region of western China killed himself by setting himself on fire Monday evening to protest Chinese rule, an advocacy group said.

headline.main: China: Tibetan Monk Kills Himself in Fiery Protest
headline.print_headline: China: Tibetan Monk Kills Himself in Fiery Protest
